snippet.title: Ratopia - Steam Next Fest 2023 Demo Gameplay
snippet.description:
This is a playable demo for Ratopia, a follow-up to the hit game Ratropolis, presented for the Steam Next Fest 2023. I might have made a poor decision at the end, but it still pretty promising nonetheless.

Try the demo here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2244130/Ratopia/

Ratopia (C) Cassel Games
Coming to Steam on Q4 2023

#ratopia #ratropolis #steam #steamnextfest #steamgame #steamgames
